name: Non-Branded Keyword Coverage
summary: Limited presence in generic industry queries. Strong brand dependency detected.
insights: Only 34% mention rate for non-branded industry queries
Good coverage of technical implementation keywords

issues.title: Over-reliance on branded traffic
issues.description: Users must already know your brand to discover you via AI

issues.title: Missing from buyer journey queries
issues.description: Not surfaced in early-stage research queries

issues.title: Limited category association
issues.description: AI models don't strongly associate your brand with category terms

recommendations: Build comprehensive category and comparison content
Optimize for 'how to' and 'what is' query patterns
Increase topical authority through content depth
